ModMetaData.name: [RH] Faction: Elite Crew
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
The Elite Crew, sometimes referred to as the "1337 Krew" or "Leet Krew", is a Terrorist faction, Middle-Eastern fundamentalists based on world domination and other evil deeds.
Credits: Dninemfive - 1.2 update solutions Saito Yui - TraderKinds.xml coding assistance Ods - For help with awesome apparel textures
